author: Special Correspondent
text:
Mettur Dam

level

The water level in the Mettur Dam stood at 87.63 feet on Tuesday against its full level of 120 feet.

The storage level of the dam was 49.984 tmc against its full capacity of 93.470 tmc. The dam was receiving an inflow of 220 cusecs.

About 15,000 cusecs of water is discharged from the dam for Samba cultivation in the Cauvery delta region. Another 400 cusecs is let out for irrigation activities under the dam’s East-West canal system in Salem, Namakkal and Erode districts, the PWD sources said.
title: Mettur level
